attributes.action: Stop the daily influx of illegal immigrants coming into the UK via the channel.
attributes.additional_details:
Attempts at clandestine entry into the UK (2010-2016). The numbers in 2020 are set to far surpass these records. Attempts by year and number:

2010 - 9,000
2011 - 10,000
2012 - 10,000
2013 - 16,000
2014 - 35,000
2015 - 84,000

(Statistics from Home Office after Freedom of Information request rounded to nearest thousand.)
attributes.background: Change our laws to make it possible to deport all illegal immigrants who arrive on our shores because they have already landed in a safe EU country on the continent. The current influx is contrary to the agreement signed between France and the UK which has cost taxpayers £114m in since 2015.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/321862
